situation: While preparing for the annual talent show, S had difficulty memorizing her lines and was on the verge of giving up, feeling overwhelmed by the pressure.
action: The teacher aide worked with S using fun mnemonic devices and rhythm to help her remember her lines. Additionally, they scheduled regular breaks during practice to manage S's attention more effectively.
effect: S felt more confident and was able to perform her part successfully, enjoying the experience and receiving praise from peers and teachers.
